source:
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
This creator recognizes you...or does he?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var>特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
アナグノリシス天測園の風雅な創造者は、冒険者にいたく興味を持っているようだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_TODO_00<tab>Deliver the nameless red fruit to the observers.

TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_ELEGANCECREATOR04285_000_000<tab>Azem? What in the blazes are you doing here?
Hold on─ You seem...thinner somehow.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_ELEGANCECREATOR04285_000_000<tab>おいおいおい、アゼムお前ってやつは……
存在をそんなに希薄にして、いったい何をしているのだ？

source: TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_ELEGANCECREATOR04285_000_001<tab>Hmm... You have much in common with <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> but it's clear you're not one of us. A familiar perhaps?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_ELEGANCECREATOR04285_000_001<tab>って、雰囲気こそ似ているが……
お前アゼムでもなければ、人でもないな？
何者だ？

source: TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_ELEGANCECREATOR04285_000_002<tab>I suppose it's just like <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> to send one of <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> minions to poke its nose into our affairs. But since you're here, instead of hanging around like a bad smell, why don't you make yourself useful?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_ELEGANCECREATOR04285_000_002<tab>ほう、なんにでも首を突っ込みたがるあいつが、使い魔を創るとは。
まあちょうどよい、主人の知り合いのよしみということで、
少々、手を貸してくれたまえ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_ELEGANCECREATOR04285_000_003<tab>I want you to take this latest work of mine─a new variety of fruit─to my colleagues.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_ELEGANCECREATOR04285_000_003<tab>なぁに、難しいことじゃない。
私が創った植物の果実を、
天測園の者たちへ配ってきてほしいのだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_ELEGANCECREATOR04285_000_004<tab>In the meantime, I will be cultivating more specimens in the Cthonic Horns. Yes, you heard that correctly. Cultivating, not simply conjuring with creation magicks. Aye, the fruit I produce is a labor of love.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_ELEGANCECREATOR04285_000_004<tab>私は、ここからすこし離れた異土の庭で研究をしていてな。
そこでは、創造魔法を使わず「自然交配」で、
新たな生物を創っている。

source: TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_ELEGANCECREATOR04285_000_005<tab>Now that my newest masterpiece is close to completion, I would have my fellow researchers sample its delights. I wish to hear their impressions before I make the final adjustments.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_ELEGANCECREATOR04285_000_005<tab>ようやく新種の果樹に実りができたゆえ、
天測園の職員たちに試食を頼みたいのだが……。
私はその、少々変わり者だと敬遠されていてな。

source: TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_ELEGANCECREATOR04285_000_006<tab>Unfortunately, for all their wisdom, I find them intolerable at the best of times, never mind when they are critiquing my work. For that reason, I would have you go in my stead. And be quick about it─lest the fruit spoil as a result of your dawdling.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_ELEGANCECREATOR04285_000_006<tab>アゼムの使い魔が渡した方が、公平な感想が得られると思うのだ。
天測園の職員たちに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E919201 /var>を配り、
味の感想を聞いてきてくれたまえ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_ELEGANCECREATOR04285_000_010<tab>Yes? Is something the matter? I've already given you your instructions, and I'd prefer not to repeat myself. Now go.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_ELEGANCECREATOR04285_000_010<tab>天測園の職員たちに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E919201 /var>を配り、
味の感想を聞いてきてくれたまえ。
頼むぞ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_OBSERVERA04285_000_020<tab>You are the familiar who arrived with Emet-Selch and Hythlodaeus, yes? And what do we have here?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_OBSERVERA04285_000_020<tab>君、エメトセルク様たちとともにいた使い魔だろう？
なぜこんなところに？

source: TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_OBSERVERA04285_000_021<tab>A new species of fruit, eh? Let us hope it tastes better than it looks.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_OBSERVERA04285_000_021<tab>新種の果実？
ふむ、いただくが……。

source: TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_OBSERVERA04285_000_023<tab>What an unusual flavor! Equal parts bitter, musty, and tart...and not entirely unpleasant. I am curious to know how such a thing was created.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_OBSERVERA04285_000_023<tab>苦いというか、渋いというか、えぐみがあるというか……。
これ、いったいどなたが創ったんだ？

source: TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_OBSERVERA04285_000_024<tab>Grown from seed in the Cthonic Horns, you say? In my experience, leaving such things to nature leads to wildly varying results. To have bred such a specimen must've been incredibly time-consuming, not to mention inefficient.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_OBSERVERA04285_000_024<tab>そうか、異土の庭の創造者がつくったものか……。
自然交配による創造は、揺らぎの幅が大きすぎる。
成功するまでの効率があまりにも悪いのではと思うぞ。

TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_OBSERVERB04285_000_031<tab>これを食べて感想を聞かせてほしいの？
わかったわ、さっそくいただくわね。

source: TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_OBSERVERB04285_000_033<tab>It's so outrageously bitter, something akin to a wave of icy cold has spread throughout my entire body!
target:
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_OBSERVERB04285_000_033<tab>せ、背筋が凍りつくような味がするわ……。
なんだか悪寒も……。

source: TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_OBSERVERB04285_000_034<tab>I certainly wouldn't eat this out of choice, but it could be made into medicine for staving off the heat in arid environments.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_OBSERVERB04285_000_034<tab>その……考え方によっては、
暑い地域に生えていたら、いい薬になるかもしれないわね……！

TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_OBSERVERC04285_000_040<tab>おや、迷子の使い魔かな？
ご主人はどうしたの？

source: TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_OBSERVERC04285_000_041<tab>For me? Why yes, I should love to try a piece!
target:
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_OBSERVERC04285_000_041<tab>これを食べればいいのかい？
なんだか不思議な使い魔だねぇ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_OBSERVERC04285_000_043<tab>I don't mean to be rude, but this falls somewhere between “rather foul” and “positively revolting.” It's so bitter, it's practically inedible.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_OBSERVERC04285_000_043<tab>どこの誰が創ったかわからないが、
ちょっと、あまりにも不味すぎると思うよ……！

source: TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_OBSERVERC04285_000_044<tab>More important, however, is the question of whether this fruit would serve its intended function. If wild animals cannot bring themselves to eat it, the seeds will never be spread. I can't imagine this creation being approved in its current state.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_OBSERVERC04285_000_044<tab>世に放ったとして、どの生物も口にしなかったら、
種子散布ができずに、すぐに絶滅してしまうだろうよ。
改良を重ねないと、認可は得られないと思うな。

source: TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_ELEGANCECREATOR04285_000_050<tab>You are returned, minus three fruit samples, I presume?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_ELEGANCECREATOR04285_000_050<tab>よく戻ってきたな、アゼムの使い魔よ。
して、どのような感想だった？

source: TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_ELEGANCECREATOR04285_000_051<tab>Is that so? Not one of them found it to their liking? They claimed my last attempt was too sweet, and now it's too bitter!? Honestly, the nerve of these so-called experts!
target:
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_ELEGANCECREATOR04285_000_051<tab>みな、美味くなかったと。
ただ甘い果実では物足りぬと思って、苦い果実と交配させたが、
上手く作用しなかったようだな。

source: TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_ELEGANCECREATOR04285_000_052<tab>As they shall soon learn, I am not so easily deterred.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_ELEGANCECREATOR04285_000_052<tab>まあよい、まあよい、案ずるな！
失敗の結果から得られるものも、大いにあるのだからな！

source: TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_ELEGANCECREATOR04285_000_053<tab>For my next creation, I'll cross-pollinate sour and sweet varieties, and see what they have to say about <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_ELEGANCECREATOR04285_000_053<tab>次は酸い果実と甘い果実を、
かけあわせてみることにしよう！
創造魔法で創る以上に、面白いものができるかもしれんぞ！

source: TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_ELEGANCECREATOR04285_000_054<tab>I'll show them it's these “wildly varying results” that come from adherence to natural processes that have the power to defy expectations! And as the familiar of Azem <var 08 E905 ((herself)) ((himself)) /var>, I'm sure you can appreciate that!
target:
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_ELEGANCECREATOR04285_000_054<tab>揺らぎの幅は大きければ大きいほど、
思いもよらぬものに出会う可能性が広がる。
冒険を好むアゼムの使い魔なら、わかってくれような？
